comments:
Reported by Danny Dig and Martin Ae.

20040611-0010

1. Add the attached file to your workspace
   Add a project reference to org.eclipse.workbench.ui
2. Remove the implemented interface and use code assist to 
choose 'IActionDelegate' (something that needs an extra import)
3. -> IA in log, eclipse unusable after this (restart required)

nothing has been changed in how DocumentLineDiffer sends out its AnnotationModel
changes. We have optimized the AnnotationPainter to directly execute incoming
changes that already are in the UI thread.
Easy reproducible using the given steps. Only happens if quick diff is on.

We will revert the optimization made in the AnnotationModelPainter for 3.0. 
The alternative to add the ProjectionDocumentManager as prenotified document 
listener is of higher risk.
